pr_title: Impl removedByPlayer and canHarvestBlock in IForgeBlock

timeline.message: Impl removedByPlayer and canHarvestBlock in IForgeBlock

timeline.author: kitlith
kitlith

timeline.bodyText:
doing exp stuff in this mixin is a bit confusing when the rest of it is in another mixin in a seperate module.
I understand why it's like this, so you don't necessarily need to change it, but I will still say it's a bit confusing.
timeline.author: kitlith

replies.bodyText: Exp stuff needs the world, block extension and entity package. I cannot think of a better way of doing this.
replies.author: rikka0w0

timeline.bodyText:
This is a bit weird, because I'm having trouble finding a "removeBlock" on ServerWorld, let along pointing out where it's called in the yarnforge patch. My best guess is what's called clearBlockState in yarnforge, but I can't find that on ServerWorld either :/
Don't worry about it too much, it's probably something weird in my setup.
timeline.author: kitlith

replies.bodyText: removeBlock is implemented in World not ServerWorld, I believe
replies.author: rikka0w0
